title: HVAC compressor replacement Suite 301
description: Compressor in rooftop unit RTU-3 serving Suite 301 failed. Tenant reports no cooling. Unit is 8 years old and out of warranty. Replace compressor and check refrigerant charge.
notes: Compressor replaced same day. Tenant satisfied with response time.

title: Parking lot resurfacing
description: Parking lot showing significant cracking and potholes in Sections B and C. Seal coat and overlay 12000 SF of asphalt. Stripe 45 parking spaces.
notes: Weekend work required to minimize tenant impact.

title: Elevator annual inspection
description: Annual elevator inspection and certification required by city code. Three passenger elevators and one freight elevator need inspection and load testing.
notes: Coordinate with elevator vendor for after-hours access.

title: Water heater replacement Unit 2B
description: 50-gallon water heater in Unit 2B leaking from bottom. Unit is 7 years old. Replace with energy-efficient heat pump water heater per property upgrade plan.
notes: Upgraded to heat pump model. Slight cost increase but better long-term efficiency.

title: Pool pump motor replacement
description: Main circulation pump motor seized. Pool closed until repair. Replace 5HP motor and inspect impeller and seal assembly.
notes: Motor replaced and pool reopened within 48 hours.

title: Roof leak investigation Units 4A-4D
description: Multiple tenants in 4th floor units reporting water stains on ceilings after recent storm. Inspect roof membrane flashing and drain assemblies in affected area.
notes: Roofer identified failed flashing at parapet wall. Temporary repair in place.

title: Grease trap cleaning and inspection
description: Quarterly grease trap cleaning for restaurant tenants Units A and E. City inspector noted overdue maintenance tag during routine inspection.
notes: Grease trap cleaned and certified. Next service due October 2025.

title: Storefront window replacement Unit B
description: Large crack in storefront glass at Hill Country Boutique. Safety concern - temporary plywood installed. Order and install new tempered glass panel.
notes: Glass on order. 3-week lead time from manufacturer.

title: Loading dock door repair Bay 2
description: Overhead loading dock door in Bay 2 off track and will not close fully. Security concern. Repair track realign door and replace worn rollers.
notes: Repaired and operational. Recommended preventive service for all 6 bay doors.

title: Fire sprinkler inspection all bays
description: Annual fire sprinkler system inspection and flow test required for insurance compliance. All 6 bays need wet system inspection and 2 bays need dry system inspection.
notes: Schedule with fire protection contractor. Must complete before insurance renewal.
